name: Inner Beast
help:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 1,500.
Ignores the damage penalty inflicted by Defiance.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Defiance.
Additional Effect: Absorbs 100% of damage dealt as HP
Additional Effect: Reduces damage taken by 20%
Duration: 4s
Beast Gauge Cost: 50

â€»This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
